meta.objective: Address remaining P2 tasks: Validation logic for Color-BPM and Low BPM edge cases.

phases.name: Edge Case Validation
phases.description: Implement missing validation logic for specific conflict edge cases.

tasks.issue: Color-BPM Validation logic is missing (Status: OFFEN).
tasks.action: Add `validate_color_bpm(color, bpm)` method. Check if BPM falls within the expected range for the given color (reference `EMOTION_COLOR_TO_BPM`). Return a warning string if out of bounds.

tasks.issue: Low BPM (< 60) with Major Key is not detected (Status: OFFEN).
tasks.action: Add `check_low_bpm_major_key(bpm, key)` method. If BPM < 60 and Key is Major, return a suggestion to switch to Minor or increase BPM, as this combination often sounds dissonant.
